title: The Paralysis of Sin
itunes:title: The Paralysis of Sin
description: God wants nothing more than for us to be fully alive. Sin cramps us, paralyzes us, prevents us from flourishing. Jesus' whole life and being is God's "yes" to human beings. So he forgives the sin of the paralytic and then invites him to walk. The glory of God is a human being fully alive.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
